scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-resources && mkdir -p dist
scripts.build-remote: source envs/deploy.env && ssh -t root@$PROD_IP 'cd marcos-22nd-web ; npm run build'
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run sync-remote && npm run build-remote
scripts.post-debug: tmux kill-session -t marcos-22nd-debug && tmux new-session -s marcos-22nd-debug -d npm run debug
scripts.deploy-debug: source envs/debug.env && ssh -t root@$PROD_IP 'cd marcos-22nd-web ; npm run post-debug'
scripts.push-debug: npm run pre-deploy && npm run deploy-debug
scripts.post-prod: tmux kill-session -t marcos-22nd && tmux new-session -s marcos-22nd -d npm run prod
scripts.deploy-prod: source envs/prod.env && ssh -t root@$PROD_IP 'cd marcos-22nd-web ; npm run post-prod'
scripts.push-prod: npm run pre-deploy && npm run deploy-prod
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run pre-deploy && npm run deploy-debug && npm run deploy-prod
scripts.restart: npm run clean && npm run build && npm start
